curam.common.util.xml.dom.input

Class SAXBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.common.util.xml.dom.input.SAXBuilder

  • public class SAXBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    SAXBuilder creates a DOM tree from SAX parsing events. This class wraps a dom4j SAXReader.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SAXBuilder()
      Default constructor.
      SAXBuilder(java.lang.String xmlReaderClassName, boolean validate)
      Constructs a reader using the given class name.

      • setFeature

        public void setFeature(java.lang.String name,
                       boolean value)
                throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Sets a SAX feature on the underlying SAX parser. This can be useful to set parser-specific features.
        Parameters:
        name - the SAX feature name
        value - the SAX feature value
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - if the feature could not be changed.

      • setProperty

        public void setProperty(java.lang.String name,
                        boolean value)
                 throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Sets a SAX property to be set on the underlying SAX parser. This can be useful to set parser-specific properties such as the location of schema or DTD resources.
        Parameters:
        name - the SAX property name
        value - the SAX property value
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - if the property could not be changed.

      • setXMLFilter

        public void setXMLFilter(org.xml.sax.XMLFilter xmlFilter)
        Sets the SAX filter to be used when filtering SAX events.
        Parameters:
        xmlFilter - the SAX filter to use or null to disable filtering

      • setValidation

        public void setValidation(boolean validate)
        Sets the validation mode.

        validate - whether or not validation should occur

        Returns:
        the xml reader
        Throws:
